name: Blade Splicer
oracle_text:
When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token.
Golems you control have first strike.

name: Master Splicer
oracle_text:
When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token.
Golems you control get +1/+1.

name: Precursor Golem
oracle_text:
When Precursor Golem enters the battlefield, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens.
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.

name: Rusted Sentinel
oracle_text: Rusted Sentinel enters the battlefield tapped.

name: Golem Artisan
oracle_text:
{2}: Target artifact creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{2}: Target artifact creature gains your choice of flying, trample, or haste until end of turn.

name: Mask of Avacyn
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Equip {3}

name: Vector Asp
oracle_text: {B}: Vector Asp gains infect until end of turn. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
